data.name: PALM CIGARETTE SNUFFER
data.inform: To customize your jewellry, please send your size to our email and wait for one week to produce. 1.The width of your palm. 2. The circumference of your hand Take a photo of your palm and email it to: contect-solkhron@gmail.com
data.customize: As silver is malleable, you can adjust the jewelry slightly to fit the shape of your hand.
